dict.acceptation: 购物中心；林荫路；铁圈球场；

sent.orig: MAX-MALL store, hotel for office necessary, brings a commercial leisure body the brand-new experience.
sent.trans: MAX-MALL将商铺、酒店为写字楼配套，带来商务休闲一体的全新体验。

sent.orig: This report will introduce Super Brand Mall shopping mall a gigantic shopping mall project in Pudong.
sent.trans: 本报告旨为介绍[正大广场]——位于上海浦东的一项巨型购物商场计画。

sent.orig: The final award is Mall China Golden Mall Awards 2010 -- Professional Elite Award.
sent.trans: 接下来将要揭晓的是，“中购联中国购物中心2010年度大奖”-年度职业精英奖。

sent.orig: Racine-Regency Mall will close at 5 pm today Friday because of the snowstorm, mall officials said.
sent.trans: 拉辛-摄政商场将在今天下午五时止周五因雪灾，购物中心的官员说。

sent.orig: Finishing their shopping at the mall, a couple discovers.
sent.trans: 一对夫妇在一家大卖场里买完东西出来时，发现。
